title.narrative: Lanzhou-Chongqing Railway Development Project (formerly Lanyu Railway)

description.narrative: The Lanzhou-Chongqing Railway (LCR) Development Project is in Chongqing municipality and the northwestern part of Sichuan and Gansu provinces, a relatively poor area. It is designed to promote sustainable economic growth by building 820 kilometers (km) of railway line from Lanzhou, the capital city of Gansu province, to Chongqing. The Project will (i) develop an efficient, safe, affordable, and environmentally sustainable railway transport system in the region; and (ii) help create more employment and income-generating opportunities, thus benefiting poor residents.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: An efficient, affordable, environment-friendly, and energy-efficient railway transport system in the region.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Passenger traffic volume increases from 19 million passengers in 2015 to 57 million passengers in 2034.

description.narrative: An efficient, affordable, environment-friendly, and energy-efficient railway transport system in the region.

title.narrative: Fuel savings total CNY616 million in 2015, and CNY1.91 billion in 2034.

description.narrative: An efficient, affordable, environment-friendly, and energy-efficient railway transport system in the region.

title.narrative: Freight traffic volume increases from 69 million tons in 2015 to 157 million tons in 2034.

description.narrative: An efficient, affordable, environment-friendly, and energy-efficient railway transport system in the region.

title.narrative: Travel time from Lanzhou to Chongqing is reduced from the present 26 hours (by rail) to 10 hours by rail in 2015.

description.narrative: An efficient, affordable, environment-friendly, and energy-efficient railway transport system in the region.

title.narrative: Cost of travel is reduced from 35 fen/km in 2006 to 15 fen/km in 2015.

description.narrative: An efficient, affordable, environment-friendly, and energy-efficient railway transport system in the region.

title.narrative: Travel time from Lanzhou to Chongqing is reduced from the presentand 42 hours (by road) to 10 hours by rail in 2015.

description.narrative: An efficient, affordable, environment-friendly, and energy-efficient railway transport system in the region.
